org.apache.logging.log4j.core.layout

Class MessageLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.layout.AbstractLayout<org.apache.logging.log4j.message.Message>
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.layout.MessageLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Layout<org.apache.logging.log4j.message.Message>, Encoder<LogEvent>

    @Plugin(name="MessageLayout",
        category="Core",
        elementType="layout",
        printObject=true)
public class MessageLayout
extends AbstractLayout<org.apache.logging.log4j.message.Message>
    Formats a LogEvent in its Message form.

    Useful in combination with a JMS Appender to map a Log4j MapMessage or StringMapMessage to a JMS MapMessage.
